risks.title: Determinism drift under asynchronous updates
risks.mitigation: Snapshot data_version + policy_version in every decision and replay against stored artifacts

risks.title: Policy/ranking conflict generates unstable ordering
risks.mitigation: Single canonical sort and conflict resolution layer

risks.title: Tenant isolation gaps in agent-managed flows
risks.mitigation: Mandatory tenant claims, per-tenant auth scopes, deny-by-default middleware

risks.title: Migration mismatches from Violet structures
risks.mitigation: Golden fixture translation tests and explicit reject paths

risks.title: Scope overflow beyond cycle appetite
risks.mitigation: Circuit breaker at Week 3 and no-go enforcement
risks.exit_criteria: No unbounded ticket additions after Week 2

risks.title: Product primitive gap blocks Violet tenant migration
risks.mitigation: Generate CMS/blog/forum modules via Studio pipeline; document explicit scope boundary in RFC
risks.exit_criteria: Migration guide published for content/community/email workaround paths

risks.title: Scaffold-level depth undermines prompt-to-app credibility
risks.mitigation: Evolve verification from structural to behavioral checks; add generated test fixtures to Studio output
risks.exit_criteria: At least one generated job passes behavioral JTBD scenarios, not just structural checks

risks.title: Migration endpoint absence blocks deprecation timeline
risks.mitigation: Implement export/import endpoints (R1-014/R1-015) with roundtrip fidelity tests
risks.exit_criteria: Roundtrip export->import->export produces identical bundles on golden fixtures

risks.title: Verification false-positive pass undermines release trust
risks.mitigation: Gate verification verdict on latest same-revision run target=all evidence
risks.exit_criteria: 0 cases where verification pass coexists with run-all fail/missing in release fixtures

risks.title: Hardcoded runtime probe assumptions create entity-dependent failures
risks.mitigation: Derive runtime smoke probes from generated entity/workflow spec
risks.exit_criteria: Entity smoke checks pass across fixture set without hardcoded entity names

risks.title: Generated OpenAPI and runtime route drift causes parity misreporting
risks.mitigation: Generate route-complete OpenAPI and enforce route/spec parity tests in CI
risks.exit_criteria: 100% route parity across generated runtime fixtures
